file.name: payments.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3

info:
  title: Payments API
  description: API to process payments for orders
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: https://coffeemesh.com
    description: main production server
  - url: https://coffeemesh-staging.com
    description: staging server for testing purposes only

paths:
  /payments:
    post:
      summary: Schedules an order for production
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - order_id
                - status
              properties:
                order_id:
                  type: string
                  format: uuid

      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON representation of the scheduled order
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - payment_id
                properties:
                  payment_id:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                  status:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid
                      - paid
                      - pending
